title: Betty White, a Humble Superstar
sub_head: Along with sitcoms, she shined on ‘Candid Camera’ and as a game-show guest.
body:
Carmel-by-the-Sea, Calif.
Whenever TV producers ripped off our “Candid Camera” format, we’d typically threaten legal action. Yet when my Carmel neighbor did it in 2012, with a hidden-camera show called “Off Their Rockers,” I sent a fan letter. What else could I do? It was Betty White.
